医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
麦戈文研究人员揭穿了 MRI 直接神经元活动成像的说法麻省理工学院麦戈文研究所的科学家表示，一种利用磁共振成像（MRI）对大脑进行成像的新方法并不像最初报道的那样直接检测神经活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/McGovern-researchers-debunk-claims-of-direct-neuronal-activity-imaging-with-MRI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/McGovern-researchers-debunk-claims-of-direct-neuronal-activity-imaging-with-MRI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b19c51d-9fbe-406c-a8a7-af4288fbd200 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 22:14:25 -0400 McGovern researchers debunk claims of direct neuronal activity imaging with MRI
阿斯顿大学新中心致力于利用人工智能改善人们的生活阿斯顿大学研究人员标志着一个新中心的开业，该中心致力于利用人工智能 (AI) 改善人们的生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Aston-Universitys-new-center-focuses-on-harnessing-AI-to-improve-peoples-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Aston-Universitys-new-center-focuses-on-harnessing-AI-to-improve-peoples-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=813e33a9-ecf9-4dad-90e9-08b7c0a26230 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 22:04:51 -0400 Aston University's new center focuses on harnessing AI to improve people's lives
研究人员开发了顺铂引起的肾损伤的风险预测模型布里格姆研究人员和合作者利用来自美国六个主要癌症中心的患者数据，开发了一种在接受化疗药物顺铂后中度至重度肾损伤的风险预测模型，这是同类中规模最大、首个可推广的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Researchers-develop-a-risk-prediction-model-for-cisplatin-induced-kidney-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Researchers-develop-a-risk-prediction-model-for-cisplatin-induced-kidney-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3de0cb2c-5361-4cf6-b604-e5fa0ac05b99 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 21:38:54 -0400 Researchers develop a risk prediction model for cisplatin-induced kidney damage
药物组合可能为治疗结直肠癌和其他实体瘤带来新希望今天发表在《科学进展》上的一项研究报告称，两种使恶性细胞表现得像病毒一样的药物可能为治疗结直肠癌和其他实体瘤带来新的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Drug-combination-could-hold-new-promise-for-treating-colorectal-cancers-and-other-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Drug-combination-could-hold-new-promise-for-treating-colorectal-cancers-and-other-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67496ecd-7fb3-4373-8e92-292c96d764e8 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 21:32:09 -0400 Drug combination could hold new promise for treating colorectal cancers and other solid tumors
极端贫困与意想不到的高心血管风险有关研究发现，在极端贫困的成年人中，心血管疾病危险因素的患病率令人惊讶，这对生活方式和饮食导致风险较低的假设提出了挑战，并强调需要有针对性的健康干预措施和政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Extreme-poverty-linked-to-unexpected-high-cardioangio-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Extreme-poverty-linked-to-unexpected-high-cardioangio-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=849c3f3d-3f21-40c6-8820-e9e06add932c Wed, 27 Mar 2024 18:33:00 -0400 Extreme poverty linked to unexpected high cardiovascular risks
运动可以治愈你的失眠成人体力活动与睡眠持续时间、白天嗜睡和当前失眠症状之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Exercise-could-be-the-cure-to-your-insomnia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Exercise-could-be-the-cure-to-your-insomnia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bc357c2-6edf-40b6-bea8-b01ad38df9d9 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 11:32:00 -0400 Exercise could be the cure to your insomnia
研究人员表示，从 1930 年到 1970 年，大脑尺寸的变化可能表明痴呆症风险降低1930 年至 1970 年间出生的个体头骨和大脑大小以及皮质厚度的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Evolving-brain-sizes-from-1930-to-1970-could-signal-decreased-dementia-risk-researchers-say.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Evolving-brain-sizes-from-1930-to-1970-could-signal-decreased-dementia-risk-researchers-say.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a31f73e-4377-4d68-be71-cd76edd6e311 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 10:44:00 -0400 Evolving brain sizes from 1930 to 1970 could signal decreased dementia risk, researchers say
人工智能驱动的方法预测蛋白质动力学以加速药物发现了解蛋白质的结构对于揭开蛋白质功能的神秘面纱和开发针对蛋白质的药物至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/AI-powered-method-predicts- Protein-dynamics-to-accelerate-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/AI-powered-method-predicts- Protein-dynamics-to-accelerate-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=123c8d0b-bc12-40f2-9781-0f24d26cc583 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 09:49:43 -0400 AI-powered method predicts protein dynamics to accelerate drug discovery
研究揭示了大脑加速衰老的危险因素研究人员此前发现了大脑中的一个“弱点”，这是一个特定的高阶区域网络，不仅在青春期后期发育，而且在老年时也表现出较早的退化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Study-reveals-risk-factors-for-faster-aging-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Study-reveals-risk-factors-for-faster-aging-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ccce0d7-c250-4159-be48-4116c95cb707 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 09:43:55 -0400 Study reveals risk factors for faster aging in the brain
用于研究小胶质细胞对阿尔茨海默病反应的异种移植模型小胶质细胞是大脑中的特殊免疫细胞。虽然它们通常可以保护我们的大脑，但它们也可能导致阿尔茨海默氏症等神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Xenotransplantation-model-used-to-study-microglial-response-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Xenotransplantation-model-used-to-study-microglial-response-to-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a4a57e7-50e7-4999-a7c5-97993fe06113 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 09:32:00 -0400 Xenotransplantation model used for studying microglial response to Alzheimer's disease
